did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Hurst Family Papers [1990-2004]

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Hurst Family Papers, Accession # 2004.8, Special Collections, Kegley Library, Wytheville Community College, Wytheville, VA

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Donated by Pamela K. Lawrence Martinson, daughter of Gwendolyn Hurst, through William Hurst in 2005.

bioghist.head: Biographical Information
bioghist.p: Gwendolyn Jane Hurst, a archaeologist and genealogist, was born on 3 February 1939 in Emporia, Kansas to William Floyd Hurst and Alma Lydia Renschler Hurst. She graduated from Washington State University and worked as an archaeologist in Hawaii (Bishop Museum), Alaska, and Thunderbird Archaeology Association in Winchester, Virginia. She also served in the Peace Corps in the 1980s. Gwen Hurst published several articles on archaeology and also was the author of U. S. Medals and Rolls of Honor, Civil War.

In the 1990s and early 2000s, Hurst did extensive research into the Hurst family and its allied family lines including the Adams, Breeding, Harrell, Nunn, Odell, and Southern families. She visited repositories across the country and regularly corresponded with other researchers. the culmination of this research may be found in the Hurst Family Papers.
Gwendolyn Hurst died on 6 October 2004 in Strasburg, Virginia and was buried in the Maplewood Memorial Lawn cemetery.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The collection has been maintained in its original order. Folders are arranged in geographical order and then by various family members. Contents of the Hurst Family - Wythe County folder have been photocopied and placed in the Kegley Library vertical file collection.

did.unittitle: Folder 1. Hurst Family - English Records.

scopecontent.p: Includes will of Sarah Hurst (1741/1746), English and Barbados records; photocopy of booklet from Hurst Castle, Hampshire, England.

did.unittitle: Folder 2. Hurst Family - Colonial Records.

scopecontent.p: Includes notes on ship passenger lists, Library of Virginia Colonial Records Project, and Minutes of the Council and general Court of Colonial Virginia.

did.unittitle: Folder 3. Hurst Family - Military Records.

scopecontent.p: Includes Revolutionary War and Civil War records.

did.unittitle: Folder 4. Hurst Family - Compiled Records (Virgina Tax, Census)
Folder 5. Hurst Family - Indiana, part 1.

scopecontent.p: Includes Putnam County records, wills of Geroge Hurst, Burton Hurst, and Jesse Hurst.

did.unittitle: Folder 6. Hurst Family - Indiana, part 2.

scopecontent.p: Includes Putnam County records, will of John Hurst, pension of William Hurst.

did.unittitle: Folder 7. Hurst Family - Lyon County, Kansas.

scopecontent.p: Includes cemetery, deeds, directories from Emporia, Lyon County, Kansas.

did.unittitle: Folder 8. Hurst Family - Kentucky.

scopecontent.p: Includes will of Henry Hurst, Morgan County, Greenup County, Christian County, and Fleming County records.

did.unittitle: Folder 9. Hurst Family - Maryland.

scopecontent.p: Includes marriage and census records.

did.unittitle: Folder 10. Hurst Family - Missouri.

scopecontent.p: Includes deed of John Hurst and notes from 1850 census.

did.unittitle: Folder 11. Hurst Family - North Carolina.

scopecontent.p: Includes notes on land, military, court, and census records.

did.unittitle: Folder 12. Hurst Family - Ohio.

scopecontent.p: Includes Hamilton County records.

did.unittitle: Folder 13. Hurst Family - South Carolina.

scopecontent.p: Includes wills and deed records.

did.unittitle: Folder 14. Hurst Family - Tennessee, part 1.

scopecontent.p: Includes land, marriage, census records; War of 1812 pension record of Elijah Hurst.

did.unittitle: Folder 15. Hurst Family - Tennessee, part 2.

scopecontent.p: Includes wills, census, tax records; wills of Elijah Hurst, Aaron Hurst.

did.unittitle: Folder 16. Hurst Family - Tennessee - Claiborne County, part 1

scopecontent.p: Includes deeds, census, wills, military records; pension of G. B. Hurst, Nathan Hurst, and Henly Hurst.

did.unittitle: Folder 17. Hurst Family - Tennessee - Claiborne County, part 2.

scopecontent.p: Includes census, wills records; records f Big Spring Primitive Baptist Church.

did.unittitle: Folder 18. Hurst Family - Tennessee - Claiborne County - William Hurst, part 1.

scopecontent.p: Includes deeds; pensions of Daniel Hurst, Hugh Hurst, Eldridge Hurst, Roland Hurst.

did.unittitle: Folder 19. Hurst Family - Tennessee - Claiborne County, Tennessee - William Hurst, part 2.

scopecontent.p: Includes Civil War, land, marriage records; Civil War records of Calvin Hurst, Eldridge Hurst, Rollan Hurst, Daniel Hurst; and inventory of estate of William Hurst.
Includes wills and marriage records.

did.unittitle: Folder 21. Hurst Family - Virginia - Amelia County.

scopecontent.p: Includes poll register.

did.unittitle: Folder 22. Hurst Family - Augusta County.

scopecontent.p: Includes excerpts and notes from Chalkley's Chronicles of the Scotch-Irish.

did.unittitle: Folder 23. Hurst Family - Virginia - Bedford County.

scopecontent.p: Includes notes on marriage of Elijah Hurst.

did.unittitle: Folder 24. Hurst Family - Botetourt County.

scopecontent.p: Includes notes on census and land records for Christopher Hurst.

did.unittitle: Folder 25. Hurst Family - Virginia - Brunswick County.

scopecontent.p: Includes deeds, wills.

did.unittitle: Folder 26. Hurst Family - Virginia - Caroline County

scopecontent.p: Includes notes on Harmon Hurst.

did.unittitle: Folder 27. Hurst Family - Virginia - Carroll County.

scopecontent.p: Includes cemetery, deed, census, and marriage records.

did.unittitle: Folder 28. Hurst Family - Virginia - Culpeper County.
Folder 29. Hurst Family - Virginia - Elizabeth City County.

scopecontent.p: Includes deeds, will of Edward Hurst and Pheby Hurst.

did.unittitle: Folder 30. Hurst Family - Virginia - Essex County.
Folder 31. Hurst Family - Virginia - Fairfax County.
Folder 32. Hurst Family - Virginia - Fauquier County

scopecontent.p: Includes deed and will of Rosanna Hurst, list of Revolutionary War soldiers.

did.unittitle: Folder 33. Hurst Family - Virginia - Fincastle County.
Folder 34. Hurst Family - Virginia - Frederick County.

scopecontent.p: Includes notes on estate of Aaron Hurst and River Bend Mansion.

did.unittitle: Folder 35. Hurst Family - Virginia - Gloucester County.
Folder 36. Hurst Family - Virginia - Halifax County.
Folder 37. Hurst Family - Virginia - Henrico County.
Folder 38. Hurst Family - Virginia - Isle of Wight County.
Folder 39. Hurst Family - Virginia - Jefferson County.

scopecontent.p: Now West Virginia; includes deeds, wills, will of James Hurst, tombstone inscriptions.

did.unittitle: Folder 40. Hurst Family - Virginia - King and Queen County.
Folder 41. Hurst Family - Virginia - King George County.
Folder 42. Hurst Family - Virginia - King William County.
Folder 43. Hurst Family - Virginia - Lancaster County.
Folder 44. Hurst Family - Virginia - Lee County.
Folder 45. Hurst Family - Virginia - Loudoun County.

scopecontent.p: Includes marriage, deeds, tax records, Alan Hurst hosue, Heston Hirst house.

did.unittitle: Folder 46. Hurst Family - Virginia - Mathews County.

scopecontent.p: Includes census, tax records, deed and 1812 pension of William Hurst.

did.unittitle: Folder 47. Hurst Family - Virginia - Mercer County.

scopecontent.p: Now West Virginia.

did.unittitle: Folder 48. Hurst Family - Virginia - Montgomery County.

scopecontent.p: Includes tax records.

did.unittitle: Folder 49. Hurst Family - Virginia - Nelson County.
Folder 50. Hurst Family - Virginia - New Kent County.
Folder 51. Hurst Family - Virginia - Norfolk County.

scopecontent.p: Includes census, newpaper, death, records and city directories.

did.unittitle: Folder 52. Hurst Family - Virginia - Northumberland County, part 1.

scopecontent.p: Includes land and tax records, will of Joseph Hurst, Thomas Hurst, and Henry Hurst.

did.unittitle: Folder 53. Hurst Family - Virginia - Northumberland County, part 2.

scopecontent.p: Includes wills, deeds, marriage records, and family group sheets.

did.unittitle: Folder 54. Hurst Family - Virginia - Orange County.

scopecontent.p: Includes headright records, wills, and deeds.

did.unittitle: Folder 55. Hurst Family - Virginia - Page County.
Folder 56. Hurst Family - Virginia - Prince William County.
Folder 57. Hurst Family - Virginia - PUlaski County, part 1.

scopecontent.p: Includes marriage, census records.

did.unittitle: Folder 58. Hurst Family - Virginia - Pulaski County, part 2.

scopecontent.p: Includes census, wills, death, birth records.

did.unittitle: Folder 59. Hurst Family - Virginia - Old Rappahannock.
Folder 60. Hurst Family - Virginia - Richmond County.
Folder 61. Hurst Family - Virginia - Roanoke County.
Folder 62. Hurst Family - Virginia - Russell County.

scopecontent.p: Includes will of Spencer and Samuel Breeding, tax records, Revolutionary War pension of Spencer Breeding.

did.unittitle: Folder 63. Hurst Family - Virginia - Shenandoah County.
Folder 64. Hurst Family - Virginia - Southampton County.
Folder 65. Hurst Family - Virginia - Spotsylvania County.
Folder 66. Hurst Family - Virginia - Stafford County.

scopecontent.p: Includes maps, deeds, wills, will of Jane Hurst and John Hurst, parish records.

did.unittitle: Folder 67. Hurst Family - Virginia - Tazewell County.

scopecontent.p: Includes order book records, tax and marriage records.

did.unittitle: Folder 68. Hurst Family - Virginia - Warren County.
Folder 69. Hurst Family - Virginia - Washington County.
Folder 70. Hurst Family - Virginia - Westmoreland County.

scopecontent.p: Includes wills, deeds, order book records.
